channel.title: Auto retaliate
channel.description:
Hello... On my server auto retaliate is on.. and i want to remove it so that its off. Permantly..
Please tell me what to search and delete
Thanks
Help is much appreciated

item.title: Auto retaliate
item.dc:creator: @Aintaro Aintaro
item.description:
@Aintaro wrote:

if(AttackingOn2.autoRetaliate == 1 && AttackingOn2.AttackingOn == 0){ AttackingOn2.AttackingOn = playerId; AttackingOn2.IsAttacking = true; }

change it to :

if(AttackingOn2.autoRetaliate == 1 && AttackingOn2.AttackingOn == 0){ AttackingOn2.AttackingOn = playerId; AttackingOn2.IsAttacking = false; }

or if u dont know what ur doing just remove the whole code…

Read full topic
